oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Wildroot Cream Oil radio show hosted by Hank Snow -- Wildroot Cream Oil radio show hosted by George Morgan
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two Wildroot Cream Oil radio programs; the first featuring Hank Snow, the Rainbow Ranch Boys, and the Wild Root Quartet, the second featuring George Morgan and the Wildrooters.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Snow; George Morgan; Rainbow Ranch Boys; Wildroot Quartet; Wildrooters
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Hank Snow) -- Wildroot Cream Oil theme -- (Now And Then There's) A Fool Such As I (Hank Snow) -- Wildroot Cream Oil theme (Wildroot Quartet) -- Wildroot Cream Oil commercial (Hank Snow) -- Wildroot Cream Oil theme (Wildroot Quartet) -- Closing statement (Hank Snow) -- Opening statement (George Morgan) -- Wildroot Cream Oil theme (George Morgan) -- So Easy To Please (George Morgan) -- Wildroot Cream Oil theme (George Morgan) -- Wildroot Cream Oil commercial (George Morgan) -- (I Just Had a Date) A Lover's Quarrel (George Morgan) -- Closing statement (George Morgan) -- Wildroot Cream Oil theme
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Snow, Hank; Morgan, George, 1925-1975; Rainbow Ranch Boys
